name: Misty Peak - The Missing Woman
description:
Detective Henry Hound has to investigate the case of a missing woman but the case becomes more complicated when very strange things start to happen in the woman's home.

Tap the arrows to move around the room. Interact with objects by touching them. Select an item from your inventory and tap anywhere on the scene to use it.

“Misty Peak - Chapter 1: The Missing Woman” has an engaging storyline that takes you into a fantasy world full of mystery and secrets to reveal.
Play the part of Detective Henry Hound and investigate the mysterious disappearance of the psychic Zara.
Solve puzzles and riddles, find keys and use the objects at your disposal to solve the mystery.
